entry.summary: RT Ʉnlock - unlock-protocol.eth 🔜 ETHCC Paris Re 4/ There were ~vibesIRL~ with @developer_dao — D_D accelerates the education and impact of a new wave of web3 builders, and Unlock & @0xPolygon teamed up to sponsor their event at Barcade! A great time was had with the dev community! turja.eth 🕺: @vibesIRL NYC is all wrapped up! huge thank you to @0xPolygon and @UnlockProtocol for sponsoring and this awesome event yesterday evening! hope everyone had a fun time before the craziness to come this weekend!!

entry.title: RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢: This is really cool - Arweave Name System (ArNS) ArNS allows you to resolve any Arweave t...
entry.summary: RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢 This is really cool - Arweave Name System (ArNS) ArNS allows you to resolve any Arweave tx hash to an ArNS domain name, like This could be a website, app, PDF, image, folder, really anything that can be uploaded to Arweave 🐘🔗 sam.arweave.dev: The Arweave Name System (ArNS) is now live on 1⃣ Build your homepage on the permaweb. 2⃣ Claim your domain. 3⃣ Rep it as your Twitter name! Be one of the first 200 to get a 'ArNS Beta Tester' Soulbound Token when the beta ends! Here's how 👇 http://Arweave.dev https://twitter.com/ar_io_network/status/1542187275211214852
